Personal-use (NOTE TO SELF):

Because this package uses Docker...

brownVignettes("hjl246") will bring you to the correct page. However, clicking 
'HTML', 'source' 'R code' for each vignette will NOT work.

i.e. http://localhost:8787/library/hjl246/doc/my_first_vignette.html

Must add 'help/' portion to link to gain access:

http://localhost:8787/help/library/hjl246/doc/my_first_vignette.html
